originalText.text:
To respond to Elizabeth B -

I worked for Dr. Gelbard for two years and never experienced any situation even remotely close to what you are describing. Dr. Gelbard has always encouraged me to be my best self and went out of her way to be a good role model. She was great with patients and always completely professional with her employees.

text.text:
To respond to Elizabeth B -

I worked for Dr. Gelbard for two years and never experienced any situation even remotely close to what you are describing. Dr. Gelbard has always encouraged me to be my best self and went out of her way to be a good role model. She was great with patients and always completely professional with her employees.

originalText.text: As a long time patient, I can enthusiastically say Dr Gelbard is a talented and kind physician with an immense breadth of knowledge.  Her focus on preventative medicine  for me has resulted in prolonged energy and health.  You will have the time with Dr Gelbard to discuss your health needs and concerns,  and as she is widely respected amongst peers and employees you will have an enjoyable visit and access to additional resources.

originalText.text: Sandra Gelbard is the kindest and most loving doctor, who has offered me so much knowledge and safety. I feel lucky to have her in my life and can honestly she saved mine. Cannot recommend enough.

text.text: Sandra Gelbard is the kindest and most loving doctor, who has offered me so much knowledge and safety. I feel lucky to have her in my life and can honestly she saved mine. Cannot recommend enough.

originalText.text: Dr. Gelbard is one of the best to do it. It pays to have a concierge doctor on your side, take it from me. She’s super thorough and straight to the point. Very knowledgeable and well connected in the medical world. She also has a great vitamin line.

text.text: Dr. Gelbard is one of the best to do it. It pays to have a concierge doctor on your side, take it from me. She’s super thorough and straight to the point. Very knowledgeable and well connected in the medical world. She also has a great vitamin line.

originalText.text:
I met Dr. Gelbard under unusual and at the time dire circumstances.  I was critically ill and didn't know it.  On Monday morning, I was taken by ambulance to Lenox Hill Hospital and short distance away.  One of my physicians had called her to expect me and in about 15 minutes she had assembled a team of doctors who were expecting me.  When I arrived, blood work, xrays and the like were ordered and the results were available very quickly.  It turned out I had a life threatening lung infection, sepsis and other grave illnesses.  My life was in jeopardy.

Dr. Gelbard arranged to admit me to the ICU department and watched over me as well as contacting one of the best thoracic surgeons, the Chief of Thoracic Surgery at the hospital, as well as other doctors with their own specialities.  I am happy to say that my 10 day stay at the hospital, even with being on a respirator for five days, turned out well.  After being treated and having minimally invasive surgery, I bounced back quickly thanks to the quick thinking and attention I had.  Dr. Gelbard had so much to do with my recovery.

She is clearly one of the most talented, intelligent and compassionate physicians I have ever met.  Whenever I have mentioned her name to other doctors, their eyes light up.  Having their respect tells all.  I hope my other half Marcia, who by the way also had so much to do with saving my life, and I become good friends with Dr. Gelbard.  I miss not seeing her reassuring smile and aura of warmth.  Anyone looking for a great internist, look not further.  Give Dr. Sandra Gelbard a call.  She is one of a kind and a renaissance physician and individual.   Richard Stein
